bill_title: require a permit and fee for public access on certain school and public lands and to establish a penalty.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a permit and fee for public access on certain school and public lands and to establish a penalty. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may enter on any land under the control of the commissioner of school and public lands without permission of the lessee of such lands unless the person has obtained a school and public lands access permit. The permit shall be issued annually for a fee of ten dollars. The Office of School and Public Lands shall administer the issuance of the permit and the collection and disposition of the fee in accordance with rules promulgated by the commissioner of school and public lands pursuant to chapter 1-26. Entry on such school and public lands in violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Fees collected for the school and public lands access permit shall be deposited in the permanent school fund established pursuant to S.D. Const., Art. VIII, § 2. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
